channel.title: Quake 3 Revolution player skins
channel.description: I just figured out that someone ported the skins from Q3R over to Q3A. Yes, even the unused Hunter skins, although I think they're fixable, some of them (the Freeman & Warrior Hunter skins) are pretty much unusable in the state they're in. They both need their head textures redone, but everything else is in there (Hunter's Q3R default skin suffered the same fate as the Freeman skin). :sob: Why did they have to commit this torture on these awesome skins? WHYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY???????????????????? Anyways, link: http://www.mediafire.com/download/emnkw4cr77ba55h/q3rskins.pk3

item.title: Quake 3 Revolution player skins
item.dc:creator: @coltongit Coltongit
item.description:
@coltongit wrote:

I just figured out that someone ported the skins from Q3R over to Q3A. Yes, even the unused Hunter skins, although I think they’re fixable, some of them (the Freeman & Warrior Hunter skins) are pretty much unusable in the state they’re in. They both need their head textures redone, but everything else is in there (Hunter’s Q3R default skin suffered the same fate as the Freeman skin). Why did they have to commit this torture on these awesome skins? WHYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY???
Anyways, link: http://www.mediafire.com/download/emnkw4cr77ba55h/q3rskins.pk3
